name: Santa's super mail sorting extravaganza!
description:
Santa's mail has been strewn everywhere by a rowdy elf! Help him sort it out in time to save Christmas, and maybe find a few cards along the way!

Press Z to flip an envelope.

Use the arrow keys to select a cubby hole

Press X to put the envelope in the hole that matches the stamp on it.

Devlog:https://aristaeus.neocities.org/posts/2020-12-25-Bits-and-Bobs-Santas-super-mail...
